summary: Far Rockaway is a neighborhood on the Rockaway Peninsula in the New York City borough of Queens.
full_text: Far Rockaway is a neighborhood on the Rockaway Peninsula in the New York City borough of Queens in the United States. It is the easternmost section of the Rockaways. The neighborhood starts at the Nassau County line and extends west to Beach 32nd Street. The neighborhood is part of Queens Community Board 14.
title: Far Rockaway, Queens
